channel.title: Github on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Github on Notes

item.title: Publish test coverage on Coveralls.io with a Github Action Workflow
item.description: Configure a NodeJS module to publish test coverage on Coveralls.io with a Github Action workflow.

item.title: Backup Repository with a Github Action Workflow
item.description: I always like to have a backup copy of all my important git repositories hosted on Github. I use a private repository at Gitlab to mirror each of these repositories. Currently, I have a Github Action workflow configured to copy it on any git push on any branches.

item.title: Setup Snapcraft in a Github Action Workflow
item.description:
Installation

snapcraft executable can be installed with the snap. Recent Ubuntu versions now have snap executable pre-installed.
